text: Rodrigo Bruno (born 15 May 1987) is an Argentinian professional rugby union player. He plays as a flanker or No8 for the Selknam in Súper Liga Americana de Rugby having previously played professionally for Pampas XV & Lazio and internationally for Argentina. “ Selknam to sign former Pumas flanker Rodrigo Bruno” “It’s Rugby - Rodrigo Bruno“ “ESPN Rugby - Rodrigo Bruno“ ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Argentina international rugby union players
title: Rodrigo Bruno
